name: Nawah Scientific Holding B.V.
description: Operator of an online destination intended to outsource scientific experiments. The company through its online platform, receives experiment requests, offering a core hub of advanced research equipment specializing in natural and medical sciences and providing services online and on-demand, enabling scientists to carry out world-class research regardless of their laboratory equipment, this revolutionizes the scientific research ecosystem.
one_liner: Operator of an online destination intended to outsource scientific experiments. The company through its online platform, receives experiment requests, offering a core hub of advanced research equipment specializing in natural and medical sciences and providing services online and on-demand, enabling scientists to carry out world-class research regardless of their laboratory equipment, this revolutionizes the scientific research ecosystem.
